name: Timebound
description:
Help Celia the farmer plant bushes in the past, so that her future self can make it through the ruined temple in the future.  Use both split screens, mirrored movement, and planting mechanics to make it through!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Jam.  The jam theme was, "Joined Together"

Known Issues:  There have been noted collision issues.  If your character gets stuck, or you get into a state where you cannot complete the level, press "R" to restart the level.   Also, if you experience a lot of lag while playing the game, we recommend that you download the windows build to play.

------------------------------------

Made by:

Sean Cunnington - Programming 

Brandon Orden - 3D Art

Dzidzor Amorin - Music/Sound
